item.title: Automate bulk metadata updates in Microsoft Purview Data Map using Azure Functions and AI
item.description:
Automate and streamline bulk metadata updates in Microsoft Purview Data Map using serverless Azure Functions. Enhance accuracy and efficiency by integrating AI for intelligent metadata extraction and mapping. To automate metadata updates, the solution leverages:
Azure Functions: Serverless compute to execute update logic on a schedule or event. Microsoft Purview REST API: Enables programmatic access to search, update, and manage metadata assets. Managed Identity: Allows secure, password-less authentication to Microsoft Purview and other Azure resources.
